title: Kimi to Koi wo Shitta
sinopse:
On the countryside, Shino was living in peace until the day she met Kento, a boy coming from Tokyo.

Black hair, glasses and smart, that boy is maybe unsociable but he’s nice and Shino can’t stop her heart beating so fast when she’s with him…that’s the beginning of their love…

(Source: Chibi Manga)
